summary: This bill, the American Cooperation with Our Neighbors Act, directs the Secretary of State to develop a strategy to strengthen subnational cooperation between the United States and Mexico, focusing on law enforcement, dialogue between governments and communities, and capacity building for border towns. It also mandates a review by the Secretary of State, in consultation with the Secretary of the Treasury, to determine steps to expand financial access to CARICOM member states. The bill requires reports to Congress on both initiatives and sets data-sharing limitations.
